title: ğŸ”§ Bump org.postgresql:postgresql from 42.7.3 to 42.7.4

labels.name: dependencies
labels.description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

body:
Bumps [org.postgresql:postgresql](https://github.com/pgjdbc/pgjdbc) from 42.7.3 to 42.7.4.
Release notes

Sourced from org.postgresql:postgresql's releases.

v42.7.4

Changes

  • Prepare for 42.7.4 release @â€‹davecramer (#3359)
  • fix: remove preDescribe from internalExecuteBatch @â€‹vlsi (#2883)
  • bug report: PgInterval ignores case for represented interval string @â€‹vishalvrv9 (#3344)
  • switch localhost and auth-test around @â€‹davecramer (#3343)
  • Update to 17beta3 @â€‹davecramer (#3308)
  • perf: avoid extra copies when receiving int4 and int2 in PGStream @â€‹vishalvrv9 (#3295)
  • Replace greater to with greater than @â€‹japinli (#3315)
  • Deprecate all PostgreSQL versions older than 9.1 @â€‹jorsol (#3335)
  • use docker v2 which changes docker-compose to docker compose @â€‹davecramer (#3339)
  • docs: clarify binaryTransfer and prepareThreshold @â€‹Chris-SP365 (#3338)
  • Clean up deps licenses, as they are now included in the original JARs @â€‹jorsol (#3330)
  • Update SCRAM dependency to 3.1 and support channel binding @â€‹jorsol (#3188)
  • Update use.md, typo @â€‹hginzel (#3314)
  • Add support for Infinity::numeric values in ResultSet.getObject @â€‹mmm444 (#3304)
  • chore: implement direct SSL ALPN connections @â€‹davecramer (#3252)
  • Ensure order of results for getDouble @â€‹davecramer (#3301)
  • chore: add PostgreSQL 15, 16, and 17beta1 to CI tests @â€‹davecramer (#3299)
  • Test for +/- infinity double values @â€‹davecramer (#3294)
  • perf: replace BufferedOutputStream with unsynchronized PgBufferedOutputStream, allow configuring different Java and SO_SNDBUF buffer sizes @â€‹vlsi (#3248)
  • Fix SSL tests @â€‹davecramer (#3260)
  • Add Korean translation file @â€‹SheerazMajeedM (#3276)
  • fix: support bytea in preferQueryMode=simple @â€‹vlsi (#3243)
  • refactor: merge PgPreparedStatement#setBinaryStream int and long methods @â€‹lucifer-Technoking (#3165)
  • test: test both binaryMode=true,false when creating connections in DatabaseMetaDataTest @â€‹vlsi (#3231)
  • Fixed typos in all source code and documentations @â€‹SheerazMajeedM (#3242)
  • Fix #3234 - Return -1 as update count for stored procedure calls @â€‹beikov (#3235)
  • Fix #3224 - conversion for TIME '24:00' to LocalTime breaks in binary-mode @â€‹pmenke-de (#3225)
  • remove self-hosted runner @â€‹davecramer (#3227)
  • Speed up getDate by parsing bytes instead of String @â€‹davecramer (#3141)
  • fix: support PreparedStatement.setBlob(1, Blob) and PreparedStatement.setClob(1, Clob) for lobs that return -1 for length @â€‹vlsi (#3136)
  • correct download for jre7 @â€‹davecramer (#3198)
  • Docs: Add cancelSignalTimeout in README @â€‹imranzaheer612 (#3190)
  • Document READ_ONLY_MODE in README @â€‹ajacob98 (#3175)
  • validates resultsetParams in PGStatement constructor. uses assertThroâ€¦ @â€‹vishalvrv9 (#3171)
  • validates resultset parameters @â€‹vishalvrv9 (#3167)
  • bump version to 42.7.4 @â€‹davecramer (#3164)

â¬†ï¸ Dependencies

  • fix(deps): update dependency com.github.spotbugs:com.github.spotbugs.gradle.plugin to v6.0.20 @â€‹renovate-bot (#3353)
  • chore(deps): update dependency gradle to v8.10 @â€‹renovate-bot (#3354)
  • fix(deps): update dependency org.roaringbitmap:roaringbitmap to v1.2.1 @â€‹renovate-bot (#3358)
  • chore(deps): update codecov/codecov-action digest to 2439dfc @â€‹renovate-bot (#3355)
  • fix(deps): update dependency com.google.errorprone:error_prone_core to v2.30.0 @â€‹renovate-bot (#3356)

... (truncated)

Changelog

Sourced from org.postgresql:postgresql's changelog.

[42.7.4] (2024-08-22 08:00:00 -0400)

Added

  • chore: SCRAM dependency to 3.1 and support channel binding [PR #3188](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3188)
  • chore: Add PostgreSQL 15, 16, and 17beta1 to CI tests [PR #3299](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3299)
  • test: Update to 17beta3 [PR #3308](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3308)
  • chore: Implement direct SSL ALPN connections [PR #3252](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3252)
  • translation: Add Korean translation file [PR #3276](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3276)

Fixed

  • fix: PgInterval ignores case for represented interval string [PR #3344](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3344)
  • perf: Avoid extra copies when receiving int4 and int2 in PGStream [PR #3295](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3295)
  • fix: Add support for Infinity::numeric values in ResultSet.getObject [PR #3304](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3304)
  • fix: Ensure order of results for getDouble [PR #3301](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3301)
  • perf: Replace BufferedOutputStream with unsynchronized PgBufferedOutputStream, allow configuring different Java and SO_SNDBUF buffer sizes [PR #3248](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3248)
  • fix: Fix SSL tests [PR #3260](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3260)
  • fix: Support bytea in preferQueryMode=simple [PR #3243](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3243)
  • fix: Fix #3234 - Return -1 as update count for stored procedure calls [PR #3235](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3235)
  • fix: Fix #3224 - conversion for TIME '24:00' to LocalTime breaks in binary-mode [PR #3225](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3225)
  • perf: Speed up getDate by parsing bytes instead of String [PR #3141](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3141)
  • fix: support PreparedStatement.setBlob(1, Blob) and PreparedStatement.setClob(1, Clob) for lobs that return -1 for length [PR #3136](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3136)
  • fix: Validates resultset Params in PGStatement constructor. uses assertThroâ€¦ [PR #3171](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3171)
  • fix: Validates resultset parameters [PR #3167](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3167)
  • docs: Replace greater to with greater than [PR #3315](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3315)
  • docs: Clarify binaryTransfer and prepareThreshold [PR #3338](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3338)
  • docs: use.md, typo [PR #3314](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3314)
  • test: Use docker v2 which changes docker-compose to docker compose #3339
  • refactor: Merge PgPreparedStatement#setBinaryStream int and long methods [PR #3165](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3165)
  • test: Test both binaryMode=true,false when creating connections in DatabaseMetaDataTest [PR #3231](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3231)
  • docs: Fixed typos in all source code and documentations [PR #3242](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3242)
  • chore: Remove self-hosted runner [PR #3227](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3227)
  • docs: Add cancelSignalTimeout in README [PR #3190](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3190)
  • docs: Document READ_ONLY_MODE in README [PR #3175](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3175)
  • test: Test for +/- infinity double values [PR #3294](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3294)
  • test: Switch localhost and auth-test around for test-gss [PR #3343](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3343)
  • fix: remove preDescribe from internalExecuteBatch [PR #2883](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#2883)

Deprecated

  • test: Deprecate all PostgreSQL versions older than 9.1 [PR #3335](pgjdbc/pgjdbc#3335)
